<style>

a {
  color: #000294;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.pkg {
  margin: 25px 0;
}

body {
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0;
  background: white;
  color: black;
  overflow: hidden;
}

div .mobile-blurb {
  margin-left: 10%;
  margin-bottom: 11%;
}

body .content::-webkit-scrollbar {
  display: none;
}

body .content {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  scroll-snap-type: y mandatory;
  overflow: auto;
  scrollbar-width: none;
}

.column-screen::before {
  content: " ";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  z-index: 1111;
  background-image: linear-gradient(#FFFFFF, transparent);
  height: 100px;
}

.column-screen::after {
  content: " ";
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 100%;
  z-index: 1111;
  background-image: linear-gradient(transparent, #FFFFFF);
  height: 100px;
}

body .content section {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  height: 45vh;
  scroll-snap-align: center;
}


.container {
	height:100%;
}

.hex {
	width:150px;
	height:86px;
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
	background-position: 50% 50%;			
	-webkit-background-size: auto 173px;							
	-moz-background-size: auto 173px;							
	-ms-background-size: auto 173px;							
	-o-background-size: auto 173px;							
	position: relative;
	float:left;
	margin:25px 5px;
	text-align:center;
	zoom:1;
}
		
.hex.hex-gap {
	margin-left: 86px;
}


@media all {
    
    @media (max-width: 900px)  {
    
      #hide-short {
          display: none;
      }
      
    }
    
    @media (min-width: 901px)  {
    
      #hide-tall {
          display: none;
      }
      
    }
    
}

</style>
